#### Overall Appearance:
The image showcases a white 3/4 Ton Extended Van parked inside a warehouse. The van has a clean, uniform white exterior with a glossy finish, indicating it is either new or well-maintained. - **Emblem**: Located in the center of the grille, the emblem appears to be a circular logo with a silver or chrome finish.
